name: tailwind-boilerplate
description: 1. npm init -y [Initializing node project] 2. npm i -D tailwindcss [installing tailwindcss as developer dependency] 3. tailwindcss intellisense vs code plugin installing 4. npx tailwindcss init [making configuration file for tailwindcss and for its customization] 5. create source and output folder 6. create a css file in the source folder 7. add tailwind directives to source css file 8. create .vscode/settings.json file [to write custom settings of vs code] 9. add {     "css.validate": false,     "tailwindCSS.emmetCompletions":true } 10. update the package.json file with - "build":"tailwindcss -i src/srcTailwind.css -o ./output/outputTailwind.css -w" 11. link html with output css file- <link rel="stylesheet" href="./output/outputTailwind.css"> 12.
